English: Of course! It's my little pals!
Chinese: 果然是他們！！
Korean: 역시! 그 애들이야!!
German: Natürlich! Meine kleinen Freunde!

English: They must be in danger! Let's hurry!
Chinese: 有種不好的預感……動作快！！
Korean: 왠지, 위험할 것 같은 분위기… 서두르자!!
German: Sie sind bestimmt in Gefahr! Schnell!

English:
Hoooooold on a second!
What are you doing to those critters?
Chinese:
給～～～我等一下！！
你想對他們做什麼！？
Korean:
잠~~~깐 기다려!!
그 애들을 어쩌려는 거야!?
German:
Moooment mal!
Was macht ihr denn mit den Tierchen?

English: Nokia?!
Chinese: 諾、諾奇雅！？
Korean: 노, 노키아!?
German: Nokia?!

English:
Huh? What're you gonna do about it?
We found these things fair and square.
Chinese:
啥！？　你們兩個想幹嘛？
這兩隻是我們找到的！
Korean:
…하아!? 뭡니까, 당신들?
이 녀석들은 우리들이 발견했거든요?
German:
Hö? Was willst du denn dagegen machen?
Wir haben die gefunden.

English:
That means we can do whatever we want with 'em.
You got a problem with that?
Chinese:
想對他們做什麼，是我們的自由吧！
我有錯嗎？你們有什麼意見嗎？
Korean:
어떻게 하든, 우리들 마음이죠?
저, 뭔가 틀린 말 했슴까? 불만 있슴까?
German:
Das heißt, wir können mit ihnen machen, was wir
wollen. Passt dir das nicht?

English:
Yeah, as a matter of fact, I DO have a problem 
with it!
Chinese:
當、當然是因為有意見，
才會這樣出場的啊！
Korean:
부, 불만 많으니까, 이~렇게
등장한 거잖아!!
German: Jawohl, das passt mir GAR NICHT, um genau zu sein!

English:
In fact, I've got nothing BUT problems!
Are you ready for me, punks?
Chinese:
倒不如說、除了意見以外還有什麼好說的！？
給我覺悟吧！這群惡徒～！
Korean:
오히려, 불만밖에 없다고 할까―!?
단념해라, 악당 녀석들~! 같은 느낌!?
German:
Ich zeig euch gleich, was mir alles nicht passt!
Zieht euch warm an, ihr Rüpel!

English: Nokia, you're so cool!
Chinese: 諾奇雅，好帥唷！
Korean: 노키아, 멋지다!
German: Nokia, du bist die Coolste!

English:
Oh really now? And what are you gonna do about
these problems, hmmm? You know, you're almost my
type, too.
Chinese:
喔，有意思……有意見妳倒是說說看啊！？
嗯嗯嗯？　這小妞算是我的菜呢！
Korean:
호오, 재밌군… 불만 있음 어쩔 건데!?
응응응? 조금은 내 취향인 누님!?
German:
Ach ja? Was genau hast du jetzt vor, hm?
Weißt du, du wärst ja sogar fast mein Typ.

English: Yeearrgh!
Chinese: 噫噫！？
Korean: 우히익!?
German: Igitt!

English:
What could you possibly do?
We're Zaxon hackers!
Chinese:
憑妳又能幹嘛？
我們可是Zaxon的駭客……
Korean:
…당신이 뭘 할 수 있다는 검까?
우리들, 그 잭슨의 해커임다…
German:
Was willst du uns anhaben?
Wir sind Zaxon-Hacker!

English:
Cross us, and there's a thousand ways you'll live
to regret it.
Chinese: 要是我們發火，可不知道會幹出什麼事唷！
Korean: 빡치면 뭘 할지, 저도 모름다?
German:
Wenn du dich mit uns anlegst, wirst du es
bereuen.

English:
You talk big, but your body is telling another
story. You're shaking like a leaf, ain't ya?
Chinese:
妳口氣這麼大，身體倒是很誠實嘛！
看妳都抖成這樣了！
Korean:
입으로는 잘난 듯 떠들어도, 몸은 솔직하구만
벌벌 떨고 있잖아, 아앙?
German:
Du hast eine große Klappe, aber deine
Körpersprache passt nicht so ganz. Du zitterst wie
Espenlaub, stimmt’s?

English: Yeah, you really are my type, aren't you, hon?
Chinese: 搞不好這小妞真的是我的菜……？
Korean: 실은 꽤나 내 취향인 누님…?
German: Du bist doch mein Typ, nicht wahr, Schätzchen?

English: You're barking up the wrong tree!
Chinese: 你、你們可別誤會了……！
Korean: 차, 착각하지 말라구…!?
German: Da seid ihr aber schief gewickelt!

English:
I've got a problem, but what's more...
my friend has a problem with you!
Chinese:
雖然我也有很多意見想說……但是比起我……
他有更多話想說！！
Korean:
나도 불만은 있지만… 사실 나 이상으로
이쪽이 더 불만 많으니까!!
German:
Mir passt vielleicht etwas nicht, aber ...
Vor allem passt ihr UNS nicht!

English: Ain't that right, [p]?
Korean: 그, 그렇지!? [p]!?
German: Stimmt’s, [p]?

English:
What was it you said? "Don't worry, my dear Nokia!
You leave those Zaxon thugs to me!"
Chinese: 你說什麼?"區區Zaxon的駭客，不需要諾奇雅大人出場，交給我吧!"
Korean:
…뭐라고뭐라고? "저런 잭슨 똘마니 상대로, 노키아 님이
나서실 필요 없습니다, 저에게 맡겨 주십시오"?
German:
Was hattest du gesagt? „Keine Angst, liebe Nokia!
Überlass diese Zaxon-Typen nur mir!“

English:
Y-Yes, well said, [p]!
You are truly worthy of being my pupil!
Now, time to put those words into action!
Chinese:
嗯嗯……說的好啊！不愧是我的徒弟，[p]！
那就交給你了！盡全力戰鬥吧！
Korean:
으, 음… 잘 말했다, 그래야 내 제자, [p]
그렇다면, 마음껏 싸우도록~!
German:
J-Jawohl, gut gebrüllt, [p]!
Du hast mich als Lehrerin verdient!
Jetzt lass den Worten Taten folgen!

English: Nokia, you're maybe not so cool after all.
Chinese: 諾奇雅……好像有點遜……
Korean: 노키아… 꼴사나울지도…
German:
Nokia, vielleicht bist du doch gar nicht so
cool ...

English: What is that? Is this some kind of joke? Hahaha.
Chinese: 什麼跟什麼？我該笑嗎？哈哈哈哈！
Korean: 뭡니까 그거? 웃으면 되는 검까? 아핫핫하
German: Was soll das? Soll das ein Witz sein? Hahaha.

English:
I'm getting sick of this. We'll shred you both.
We'll take your accounts and then rip you up.
Chinese:
是說……你們煩死了！我要打得你們片甲不留！
然後盜取你們的帳號，毀個稀巴爛！
Korean:
…그보다, 짜증남다. 둘 다 만신창이로 만든 다음
계정도 뺏어다가 엉망진창으로 만들어 주겠슴다
German:
Ich habe langsam die Nase voll. Wir machen euch
beide fertig. Aber erst schnappen wir uns eure
Accounts.
